stories.title: Show HN: Simple Android app that deep links Twitter URLs to Nitter

stories.text:
I'm interested in seeing how other smaller companies compare in terms of salary and other compensation data.

I work in a Midwest city and mainly been at web shops and early startups fewer than 100 people. Looking for a website filled with work culture/salary discussions from people that mostly reflect my career background. An online community where people pseudonymously represent the lesser heard of companies, and share compensation and work culture information. I mostly see people repping big companies at Blind, which makes it not a very useful tool if I'm not interested in going to a big company.

Or even a levels.fyi for the smaller startups would be nice.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a TeamBlind for people of smaller startups/businesses?

stories.text: Doesn't this break the purpose of MFA, which is that the thing you know (password) is separate from the thing you have (MFA device)? If so, then why do all of the reputable password managers include TOTP functionality?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why do password managers have TOTP?
